title: making send or receive-only channels?
body:
I'm surprised the compiler permits create send- or receive-only channels:

http://play.golang.org/p/xDORgCWR3d

package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	c := make(<-chan int)
	fmt.Printf("%T\n", c)
}

-------

Is that an accident?

I can't see what utility they'd have.
